rules.description: Ensure command + options + arrow keys to switch desktops
Swap command and control in some apps
Swap left-ctrl and command only in Terminal
Exceptions for Swap left-ctrl and command only in Terminal
right-command to  ctrl only in Terminal
Map Command_Shift + C/V to copy/paste in term (ala Linux)
Map Command_Shift + N to open new terminal
Open a terminal window with Ctrl-RAlt-T
Exchange command + arrow keys with option + arrow keys except in terminal
Exchange command + arrow keys with control + arrow keys only in terminal
